ActFinancial Administration Act
Borrowing Authority Act, 1996-97
PrecisAuthority to raise funds over the course of Fiscal Year 2005-2006 by way of the issue and sale of Government of Canada securities or other instruments, such as Treasury Bills and Treasury Notes.
